moves.1. d4 d5 2. c4 e5 3. dxe5 d4 4. e3 Bb4+: This was the start of the themed mini tournament.
moves.11. Bd2 Qxa1 12. Bd3: Well I'm up by three points but I'm *way* behind in development and I need to winkle my queen out of there.
moves.12... Qxe5 13. Nf3 Qe7: Well I get my queen out but I need to develop fast.
moves.14. Re1: Maybe hoping I wouldn't notice Be6?
I've now caught up in development and I have the edge.
moves.18. Nc3: ?? Instead of defending his bishop we removes a defender.
moves.28. Nxd4 Qxd4 29. Be3 Qe4+: I look around looking for a mate.
moves.30. Kg1 Ng4 31. Bxa7 Qe1+ 32. Kg2 Qe2+ 3: I keep looking for a mate.
moves.34. Kh4 Qxh2+: He's in a mate net now.
moves.35. Kg5 Rf5+ 36. Kg6 Qd2 37. Kxg7 Qg5+: He times out. Please drop a comment and rate.
